text:
@realDonaldTrump THE BIGGEST SCANDAL OF OUR TIMES?
Ignoring a global pandemic because you thought it would hurt your re-election.

United States
Coronavirus Cases: 2,357,667
Deaths: 122,269

nothing less than #CriminallyNegligentManslaughter
